name: Gekkan Shoujo - Mikorin
description: Here is a dash of our adorable Mikorin!! xD

user.name: xKiYoMiNaTiONx
user.about:
Being born in Hawaii really sets me aside from most asian drama watchers. I've seen people are from the Mainland, other Asian Countries, but rarely do you see a common local person from your own island. I am proud to live in Hawaii, but I really wish that I lived elsewhere sometimes!!

I am a Campbell HS 2005 Graduate, I went to Leeward Community College and graduated with an AS in Digital Media in 2009. I used to own a website, and I also am an otaku!! I really love anime!!

Other interesting facts about me is that I have been to Japan once in 2010. I went there to study abroad for one month, and believe me, that month was one of the best times of my life! . I play the violin, and have been playing for about 2 Years. I really love music too!!

I also like to Cosplay!! So far I have cosplayed as Haruhi Suzumiya (North High School Uniform), Moka Akashiya from Rosario Vampire, and Hino Kahoko from La Corda d'Oro. In 2011, I cosplayed as Haruhi Suzumiya from the Disappearance Movie, and Rhiannon from Tears to Tiara. In 2012, I cosplayed as Rima Touya from Vampire Knight. In 2013, I cosplayed as Utau Hoshina from Shugo Chara as well as my Haruhi Suzumiya from the Disappearance Movie. In Fall of 2013, I am also planning on cosplaying as Amy Yuuzuki from Jyuden Sentai Kyouryuuger and Matsuoka Gou from Free! for Oni-con Hawaii. In 2014, I cosplayed as Matsuoka Gou from Free!, Akira Kogami from Lucky Star, and Mashiro Moritaka from Bakuman!
